name: 8 Player 8-bit Racing
description:
8 Bit Racing take you into all the fun of the Grand Prix, with up to 8 players.

Race around 6 different tracks, from the jungles of Malaysia to the deserts of Dubai.

Comes with over 10 different music tracks to keep you entertained.

Use the steering wheel to control your car, press down to accelerate and turn to move the car, just like a regular steering wheel.
